name: Like a Speeding Bullet prototype
description:
This was a small prototype made for my university capstone project in May 2021. 

The game is a first person shooter with parkour elements. Get to the end as fast as possible and shoot targets for bonus time.

In this build is a tutorial stage and one example level.

Credits:
Magica Voxel by ephtracy was used to create art assets

Everything else was done by myself
